item.title: Angelina Jolie, Doug Liman Team for Spy Thriller ‘The Initiative’ (Exclusive)
item.description: Universal is buying the hot package that will reunite the ‘Mr. and Mrs. Smith’ duo and pair them with action writer F. Scott Frazier.
